version_description:
Wow, have we got a polished update for you!

We spent a bit of time making sure everything in our app is working seamlessly. The time info on your notifications is now easier to read and the whole settings panel has been updated. Oh! And if you add a number to the event invite page, we'll now display it so that you can check to make sure it's correct.

Love our app? Help us by leaving your 5 star review!

Encountered an issue? Tell us about it at hello@joinverse.com

Guess what?

You can now reset your PIN from within the app!

Also, now you'll see your transaction list and balance every time you open the app. We've also rearranged the main menu and now the actions that you use the most are first in line.

Ask and you shall receive!

Do we deserve your 5 star review? We hope so! Help us spread the word!

Encountered an issue? We're here for you! Write us at hello@verse.me

It's almost christmas, so we've brought you some gifts:

1. Your feed is now BIGGER (the text, we mean) and better (emojis!!!).
2. And, (this is major)- You can now 'Like' comments!

We've also:
-Moved the scanner to the top right corner of the 'Contacts' screen;
-Given a makeover to the whole 'moving into the next transfer limit level' experience;
-Changed up the tab bar a little bit.

So, what do you think? Are you happy? Consider leaving us a five star review!

Is there something we could do better to make you even happier? Let us know by writing us at hello@verse.me

Y’all ready for this?

Remember when we said, ‘ask and you shall receive?’

Well, you asked for a way to split costs with your friends from within the app, and we’ve brought it to you. Already. This far into the year. All you have to do is choose more than one contact (you can include yourself) when you make a ‘Request’ and we do the math for you. (mic drop)

Not impressed?

Don’t worry, we have more.

You can now also:
-Invite your friends right from the main tool bar (and earn €5 when they spend €50…for you AND for them…)
-Double click on your balance to open the Main Menu
and
-See all your past actions in the ‘Me’ tab

Happy new year, everybody!!

Like this upgrade? How about that 5 star review?

Encountered an issue? We're here for you! Write us at hello@verse.me

Hey friends! We're baaaack!

Here's what's new:

-Choose the 'Split the bill' option from the Main Menu
-Verse user profiles are now public! Click on them from the feed and pay any Verse user or request money from your Verse friends
-Click on user's pictures to make them bigger
-Click on hashtags and see who else has used them
-Ok, basically, what we're trying to tell you is that the entire feed has a new look and feel and is a lot more exciting
-Track the progress your friends are making towards the €5 we give you both when they pay €50


You happy? Leave us a 5 star review!

Not happy? Let us know why! Write us at hello@verse.me

It's that time of the week again!!!

Here's a list of upgrades:
-You can now access people's profiles from your transaction list;
-tap on icons (on the 'Feed', 'Event', and 'Me' tabs) to go back to the top (no more scrolling!);
-click on a friend's name to edit the amount they have to pay when you're splitting the bill;
-and see a list of 'Likes' from your feed!

We'll be back really soon with more.

Liking us? Leave us that five star review.
Found something that's bothering you? Let us know at hello@verse.me

Hello lovely Verse people!

We've got an update for you!

Now you can:
-see the list of 'likes' you've received from the 'Me' tab
-click on your Verse balance to automatically select its full amount before you transfer it to your bank
-see canceled and rejected transactions in your transaction list
-be delighted by the new icons you'll see for transfering to your bank and for adding money to Verse

How're we doing?
Good? Leave us a 5 star review!
Not so good? Write us at hello@verse.me and tell us what's up!

Hello guys. We've just fixed a bug that was happening on early versions of iOS 11. Happy week everybody! We'll talk soon for new features!
Hello guys. We've just fixed a bug that was happening on early versions of iOS 11. Happy week everybody! We'll talk soon for new features!

Were you wondering where we'd been since last week?

Well, working on improvements, that's where.

You'll notice that now:
-it's easier to tap on almost everything you have to tap on
-the 'Like' action on the feed is animated
-you can zoom in on other user's profile pics
-all numbers are formatted accross the top of the app
-the confirmation screen opens a keyboard when you try to confirm a transaction without writing a comment (to kindly remind you that you have to)

So, are you satisfied? Consider leaving us a 5 star review.
Found something funky? Let us fix it or you! Write us at hello@verse.me

The weather's getting better and better...and so is our app!

Here's this week's news:
-You can now set a closing time for your events
-The screens for adding cards and bank accounts got a makeover
-You'll now be notified when you pay someone's request if that person is not on your contact list
-We've changed the colors of the hashtags and events

How are we doing? Good?
Leave us a 5 star review!

Find something you think we could improve?
Let us know by writing us at hello@verse.me

Hello friends! Hope your summer is off to a great start.

Here at Verse we're busy updating your 'Events' feature, so you can easily keep on top of all your trips, BBQ's, and nights out.

You do the relaxing, we'll do the rest :)

Now you can:
- Send event's guestlists via email
- Remind your friends that they haven't joined your event yet
- Add a contact field when you create the event
- Click on the event host's picture to access their public profile

Hey everyone!

We are super happy to introduce our newest feature, "Groups". Groups is the perfect tool to share expenses when you go on trips with your friends. Check it out this summer and let us know what you think.

We also wanted to let you know that you can now share Verse Events with your friends directly via Whatsapp!

Enjoying our app?
How about leaving us a 5 stars review?

Is there something you’d like us to do that we’re not doing already?
Send us a note at hello@verse.me and let us know!

Try our new QRs to pay your friends even faster and without having to give your phone number. In this new version we show you where they are and how they are used.

We have improved this functionality so you can select the currency you need in an easier way and configure it for future payments.
